tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SmartRefrigeratorUsagePatterns (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature_setting INT,
    humidity_setting INT,
    usage_hours INT
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS refrigerator_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    energy_usage DECIMAL,
    time_stamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS recommended_settings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    recommended_temperature DECIMAL,
    recommended_humidity DECIMAL,
    recommended_energy_saving BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE usage_data (
    user_id UUID,
    usage_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    energy_consumption FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, usage_timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE recommendation_settings (
    setting_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    temperature_setting INT,
    humidity_setting INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
  user_id UUID,
  username VARCHAR,
  email VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  location VARCHAR
);
